###

###

The extra resistance activates key muscle groups by up to 23%, helping you
challenge yourself more and get stronger, fitter, faster.

###

Wearing Physiclo while running and cycling increases cardio intensity to boost
your heart rate and calories burned.

###

Make every minute count more when you add extra resistance to each step, and
get your 40-minute workout done in 30.

Great for rehab!

Review by Sharie W. on 30 Mar 2022 review stating Great for rehab!

These pants are amazing for supporting my knee rehabilitation! The way the
bands are placed activates all the right muscles groups. I have more
stability, less pain, and can do much more activity. They almost function as a
brace, but they help to activate and strengthen my muscles instead of
compensating for weakness. I wear them every day!

On Pro Resistance Tights for Women - Athletic Grey
